unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Sharmaji after that kabaddi match last week? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad on 20/10/2023. Hopefully, it's not a long-term thing. The team needs him for the upcoming Pro Kabaddi League starting 05/11/2023! Remember that epic raid he pulled off in Delhi at 14:00 hrs last season? Get well soon, Sharmaji! We're all praying for you at IIT Kanpur!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Sharmaji after that kabaddi match last week? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad on twentieth october two thousand and twenty three. Hopefully, it's not a long-term thing. The team needs him for the upcoming P K L starting fifth november two thousand and twenty three! Remember that epic raid he pulled off in Delhi at two post meridiem last season? Get well soon, Sharmaji! We're all praying for you at I I T Kanpur!
